projects.resume: Simulators with one-to-one scale, not only with a visual interaction but on a haptic interaction too. I've developed training simulators with mixed reality in order to acquire immersive learning or like it's called nowadays 'serious games'.
projects.content: A simulator can decrease the risks, especially from a surgical point of view. This immersive tool is about a training program for orthopedic resident students using haptic devices giving another way to achieve the surgical process during the trauma surgery. Due to the haptic interaction, the resident can learn the motor habilities with a higher interaction than the one which is given in the real surgical room.
